group_1.textLeft: Owwwwww!
What's your problem, Ranka!? @Don't just go poking at my wounds, you idiot!

group_1.textRight: I just wanted to see if you'd healed yet or not.

group_1.textLeft: You saw what happened to me that night.
It's gonna take forever before it heals!
Gah, it hurts...

group_1.textRight: Anyway, look at how empty this place is now, it's just @the two of us here...

group_1.textLeft: I knew this would happen, since everyone's faith was @in my strength.

group_1.textRight: That's surprising, it sounds like you've been waiting @for this to happen.

group_1.textLeft: I just know a lot about myself.

group_1.textRight: Then, you could've changed yourself a bit, @couldn't you?

group_1.textLeft: No way.
My father and I both did everything we could,
but still failed despite that...

group_1.textRight: But what are you going to do now? You might end up alone at this rate...

group_1.textLeft: Then what am I supposed to do? @Go work for Yuna again?
Not a chance.
Juri the Great will never work under Yuna again.
Because she's the only one that can satisfy my urges.

group_1.textRight: You're such a pain to deal with.

group_1.textLeft: Then why don't you leave like everyone else? @You don't have to stay with me.

group_1.textRight: I'm not going to leave you.

group_1.textLeft: Why not?

group_1.textRight: Because you saved me from the Bat of Monzenbashi.

group_1.textLeft: You're talking about a dead woman. Juri the Great is pretty much dead now, too.
Ranka, you're free to go. @Go on, leave already.

group_1.textRight: Back then, I did everything the Bat told me to.
Even things I didn't want to...
Because I thought I couldn't make it without @someone strong nearby.
But then you saved me from her,
and I decided I wouldn't follow someone just because they were strong.
And I still owe you for that.

group_1.textLeft: ... If you want to stay so bad, @Juri the Great won't stop you.
Suit yourself.
